title: Community Manager for Online Academy (Credit, Business & Mentorship Focus)
job_overview:
???? Job Title:

Virtual Community Manager for College-Based Credit & Financial Academy (Philippines Only)

?

???? Job Overview:

I’m looking to hire a dedicated virtual assistant based in the Philippines to help manage my private online community on Skool, built specifically for college students ages 18–25.

This is not a general mentorship group — it’s a structured credit education and financial guidance academy for students who are serious about building their future while they’re still in school.

You’ll be in charge of managing, organizing, and engaging two paid groups that help these students grow financially, stay motivated, and take action.

?

????????????? Who This Academy Serves:
 • College students in the U.S. (ages 18–25 only)
 • Most are first-generation learners looking to get ahead financially
 • They’re learning about credit, money habits, financial literacy, and business basics
 • They may be beginners or already interested in credit/debt/funding

?

???? Your Core Responsibilities:
 • ???? Manage 2 paid Skool communities:
 • $35/month Knowledge Tier
 • $100/month Full Access Tier
 • ???? Welcome each student as they join the program
 • ???? Guide them through course content and announcements
 • ???? Post weekly check-ins, questions, tips, and updates
 • ???? Upload videos, PDFs, and organized content into classroom sections
 • ???? Monitor questions and make sure students stay encouraged and engaged
 • ???? Remind students about upcoming updates or calls
 • ???? Suggest new ways to keep the group active and on track

?

???? What I’m Looking For:
 • Based in the Philippines
 • Familiar with Skool or other community platforms (or a fast learner)
 • Excellent in English communication (clear, helpful, friendly)
 • Able to manage groups without hand-holding
 • Organized, proactive, and consistent
 • Passionate about working with youth or education
 • Bonus: Canva, GoHighLevel, or credit/financial knowledge

?

???? Growth Opportunity:
 • Long-term role with potential for increased responsibilities
 • Bonuses based on performance and group engagement
 • A chance to work closely with a growing U.S.-based consulting brand

?

???? Pay & Hours:
 • Competitive monthly pay (based on experience)
 • Part-time to start (with full-time opportunity)
 • Flexible hours as long as the group stays active and supported

?

???? How to Apply:

Please send:
 • Your resume or work experience summary
 • A short voice or video note introducing yourself (optional but preferred)
 • Any community or customer service experience
 • Your weekly availability
